name: sigarimcd
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: -| wceq(c1, cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cc, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s1)))))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), cc), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), cc))
-| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), cc))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), cc))
-| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), cc))

stmt.origin: recnd(co(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), cc))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), cc))
-| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), cr))
-| wceq(c1, cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cc, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s1)))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), cc))
-| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
-| wceq(c1, cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cc, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s1)))))

-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c2)

comment: Signed area takes value in complex numbers. Deduction version. (Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 23-Sep-2017.)
